EmailTemplate.subject: North London Regional Youth Board - Session 2 - Friday 8th April
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
It's time for the next meeting of the North London Regional Youth Board!
The details of the session are as follows:
Date: Friday 8th April Time: 14:45 - 18:00 Location: The Challenge, Courtyard 2, Highgate Studios, 53-79 Highgate Road, London, NW5 1TL
We've got loads of fun things lined up for the session, including:
A review of NCS Action Day 2016, and what you'd like to see in 2017 A chance to share your ideas on the best ways to sell NCS to more young people Writing and recording your testimonials about NCS, to be used at our staff training this summer! Plus some Easter-themed snacks!
We'd love to see you there. Don't worry if you weren't able to make it to the last session, you're still very welcome to come along to this one. Click HERE (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/north-london-regional-youth-board-second-meeting-tickets-24291090305) to register your attendance.
Kind regards,
The Challenge Society
